Package sait.bms.manager

Class BookManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.problemdomain.Book
      • sait.bms.manager.BookManager
  • public class BookManager
extends Book
    BookManager is to read and write the input and output from the user input. and run the checkOut, find, display and save
    Version:
    September 28, 2022
    Author:
    Tam Nguyen, Ma Cubay, Lee Hok Yin
